name: Level Design Assignment - Location Study
description:
This project was created in Unreal Engine 4 for an assignment in a level design class as part of my last semester of graduate school. I was given 2 weeks to design a level taking ideas from a location study I did on Trolley Square. Part of the assignment was that we were only allowed to use basic materials with no textures and only use the default unreal third person controller. 

Thanks for playing!! Feel free to leave feedback!
